description.value:
You take on the imposing form of a large, winged oni.

Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Enlarge]{Enlarge} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fly]{Fly}.

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Great Tengu Form]{Effect: Great Tengu Form}
